title: Peptide-drug conjugate technology paves the way for advanced anti-photoageing solutions
desc: Researchers from China and Singapore develop novel ingredient using peptide-drug conjugate technology, which outperforms traditional anti-ageing peptides.

title: Ohio State’s NCAA Tournament Hopes Take Major Blow in 74-57 Blowout Loss at Iowa
desc: Ohio State is demolished on the road by Iowa, 74-57, as its NCAA Tournament chances sink to their lowest of the season.

title: Orban steps up oil accusations against Ukraine after vetoing EU loan to Kyiv
desc: Hungary's prime minister accuses Kyiv of imposing an "oil blockade" after Kyiv says a critical pipeline was closed after Russian strikes.

title: US-based Ghanaian man killed by tractor-trailer while clearing snow from car
desc: A 35-year-old Ghanaian man residing in the United States, Patrick Sarpong, has tragically died after being hit by a tractor-trailer while clearing snow from his car on a major Massachusetts highway.

title: Megaworld net income up 11% in 2025, rises to ₱24B
desc: Megaworld Corp. posted an 11% growth in its net income for 2025, driven by the performance of its core businesses, the listed property and township developer announced Thursday.

desc: A Daylesford man has arrested and charged after solo female hiker was allegedly assaulted in central Victoria.

title: 'Horrific facts': Sydney grandpa kidnap and murder accused in court
